name: Powerdeploy
body:
### Welcome to PowerDeploy

```
$ git clone https://github.com/tobiaszuercher/PowerDeploy.git
$ cd PowerDeploy/SampleApp
$ execute shell.cmd or call shell.ps1 from powershell
```

Note this is still under construction! I'll blog about the first "official" release soon!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
